article_title: A Useless Regulation That Harms Rural Health Care

article_metadata.author: Katherine Restrepo

og.description: North Carolina legislators involved with the Certificate of Need (CON) debate are probably overwhelmed with conflicting studies on whether the regulatory program should stay, be reduced, or go altogether. This week, I continue to repeat myself by making the case as to why CON is an outdated law that has not [...]
